definition: to read and pass on/to pass on for perusal
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to inspect/to review/to read/to peruse/to go through/to experience

sentences.english: How do I convince her to stop forwarding all this crap?
sentences.chinese: 我怎麼才能說服她停止傳閱這些無聊的東西？

sentences.english: Please read this notice and hand it on.
Excellent article on cancer. Pass it on.
sentences.chinese: 關於癌症的優秀文章，請將其傳閱。

sentences.english: Takes minutes of meetings, accurately transcribes and circulates to appropriate recipients.
sentences.chinese: 準確做會議記錄，發給相關人員傳閱。

sentences.english: Please watch this notice and hand it on.
sentences.chinese: 請把這張通知看一下，並傳閱。

sentences.english: Once the content is agreed upon, new draft guidelines will be circulated for comment.
sentences.chinese: 內容一旦商定，新的準則草案就將傳閱以聽取意見。

sentences.english: Please read this notice and pass it on.
sentences.chinese: 請把這張通知看一下，並傳閱。

sentences.english: Thank you for reading, and please pass this article along.
sentences.chinese: 感謝您的閱讀，請將這篇文章傳閱。

sentences.english: The syllabus is going around the class.
sentences.chinese: 課程表就在這兒傳閱一下。

sentences.english: The paper has been circulated among scholars, who believe it could have merit.
sentences.chinese: 該論文已經在那些覺得有研究意義的學者間傳閱。

sentences.english: You throw out little slips of paper  and they take turns going back and forth.
sentences.chinese: 你如果將競價寫在紙上，他們會來來回回地傳閱。

definition: to obscure the facts (idiom); to mislead the public with prevarication and deliberate falsehoods
frightening words to scare people (idiom); alarmist talk/reds under the beds
lit. looking for a fine horse using only a picture (idiom)/fig. to do things along rigid, conventional lines/to try and find sth with the help of a clue
